title: Show corresponding Receiver card in Tx Confirmation & Tx Status Pages depending if is Address, Account, Contact or Saved Address

labels.name: E:Mobile Wallet Send Page MVP
labels.description: all issues for the send page of the wallet

body: # Feature Issue ### User Story As a user, I want to easily identify and differentiate between different types of receivers (Address, Account, Contact, or Saved Address) on the Tx Confirmation & Tx Sending Pages, **so that** I can conduct transactions with clarity and confidence. ### Description Figma Design 1: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2401-547492&mode=design&t=nilAPUyk59K54DQh-4 Figma Design 2: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2401-547521&mode=design&t=nilAPUyk59K54DQh-4 Figma Design 3: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2401-548229&mode=design&t=nilAPUyk59K54DQh-4 Figma Design 4: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2412-568897&mode=design&t=nilAPUyk59K54DQh-4 Figma Design 5: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2401-551606&mode=design&t=nilAPUyk59K54DQh-4 Figma Design 6: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2412-569338&mode=design&t=nilAPUyk59K54DQh-4 Figma Design 7: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2401-551942&mode=design&t=nilAPUyk59K54DQh-4 Figma Design 8: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2412-569753&mode=design&t=nilAPUyk59K54DQh-4 Visual reference: ### Acceptance Criteria - [ ] If receiver is a saved address, show corresponding "To" card in Transaction Confirmation screen and corresponding "to" label in Transaction Status screen title - [ ] If receiver is a contact, show corresponding "To" card in Transaction Confirmation screen and corresponding "to" label in Transaction Status screen title - [ ] If receiver is a different account from the user, show corresponding "To" card in Transaction Confirmation screen and corresponding "to" label in Transaction Status screen title - [ ] If receiver is an address that doesn't fit on any of the above criterias, show corresponding "To" card in Transaction Confirmation screen and corresponding "to" label in Transaction Status screen title
